user.title: Add text-to-speech engine
user.description:
Base URL Example: https://api.openai.com
You may also use a local Kokoro server (e.g., http://localhost:8880).
Endpoints Used: The integration will automatically use /v1/models, /v1/audio/voices, and /v1/audio/speech as needed. Do not include these in the base URL.

data.url: Enter an OpenAI-compatible endpoint (optionally include a port number).

error.wrong_api_key: Invalid API key. Please enter a valid API key.

data.chime: Enable chime sound prior speech (useful for announcements)
data.normalize_audio: Enable loudness for generated audio (uses more CPU)
